feed.title: It Disney Matter! (it does) with Me3 Comedy

entry.title: Tonight Matthew, We Watch Finding Dory (It Disney Matter! Episode 6)
entry.content:
This week it is a very special - and quick - episode of IDM as the pair have been to the UK PREMIERE of FINDING DORY. Without notes Hitch and Marianne let it be known what they think of all this fishy business. Enjoy!

**Note, this is somewhat explicit audio, contains adult language and sexual themes which make this unsuitable for family listening**


Download the latest episode: It Disney Matter! (It Does) - Me3 Comedy
Subscribe to the podcast: RSS It Disney Matter! (It Does) - Me3 Comedy

entry.title: Tonight Matthew, We Watch Robin Hood (It Disney Matter, Ep. 4)
entry.content:
Episode 4 is now in the wild - Robin Hood! After an epic public vote we have we have watched one of Marianne's very favourite Disney films of all time. Listen in to find out what we thought of it - and find out what film we're gonna watch next!

entry.title: Tonight Matthew, We Watch Snow White! (It Disney Matter, Ep. 1)
entry.content:
Download here: Me3 Comedy Podcast -- Episode 1: Snow White

This is the first episode from Me3 Comedy's brand new Disney themed podcast, in which we, comedy lovers Marianne MacRae and Richard Hanrahan, endeavour to watch and discuss every Disney film, in order. 

In order to do what, I hear you ask? Well that's a very good question - and one we will come to answer over the course of this P'cast.

In today's ep', we discuss Snow White, and generally try and work out what it is we are hoping to do with this thing, on the fly. "On which fly?" you moan like a rudder imprisoned by its rut, wielded by a fool lost in the sea of his own eyes; we do not respond.

**Note, this is somewhat explicit audio, contains adult language and sexual themes which make this unsuitable for family listening** 

If you like us, follow our work in general at the usual places:
Twitter @Me3_Comedy : : Facebook : : Tumblr : : YouTube : : Soundcloud

Please like, share, comment, subscribe and most importantly of all, have a lovely day.

link.title: Tonight Matthew, We Watch Snow White! (It Disney Matter, Ep. 1)
